apple_vendor_description: This couple with a heart emoji on Apple devices features two men, one with medium-dark skin tone and the other with dark skin tone, embracing with a luminous heart between them. Apple's design imbues their figures with a soft, rounded dimensionality and a polished, tactile appearance through its signature 3D shading and smooth gradients. The central heart glows with warmth, representing love, connection, and unity between partners, presented with the inclusive and affectionate visual style characteristic of Apple's emoji set.
